betterquesting:10.desc:8:
In version 6.17.03 Greg added an early game smelter called a Melter.  This machine works similar to the smelter except it lis limited to furnace level materials such as Copper, Tin, Lead, and Calcite.  This machine requires an iron/steel casing, ceramic crucible, steel fluid pipes, double copper places, and some bricks.  You only need a a burning box capable for 16 to 64 HU.
§b
Pro Tip:  Once you get stainless steel, you can make a Mixer and have the automatic output of the Melter gp into the input of the mixer.  Next place a ceramic mold next to the automatic output of the Mixer.  Next place a hopper under the mold and the output of the hopper into a chest.  This will make a alloy furnace to make low temperature alloys such as Broze and Brass.
§a
To complete the quest craft:
1 Melter
